dialog.text: You should first start with rock on the bottom half of the square
How long should the rock be
It just covers the entire bottom half of the screen. In addition, the upper half of the square is sky. I'll fill you in on the finer details later.

In the bottom half of the square, fill the upper right part with sea. It doesn't quite reach the very bottom of the square or the very left-side of the square. It covers around 60% of the bottom half of the square.
So basically the right part of the rock minus some of the bottom and some of the left is going to be sea?
Yup, and the lower left part of the UPPER square should be a mountain range that declines as it goes from left to right.
does the mountain attach to the rock or where is it sitting?
I peeked, in terms of shape, what you have is good. But the mountain extends all the way to the right of the screen until it is almost gone.
I think i got that, what is next? is there anything above the mountain?
No, but there is a tree formation at the wide part of the mountain. Its about as tall as the mountain, and it extends about 20% the width of the screen. It also has a declining pattern.
What do you mean by width of the screen and declining pattern?

Width of the square is what I meant and the declining pattern is basically that it starts out as tall as the mountains, but it shrinks to nothing as you move to the right (20% of the square width to the right)
i think i got that, what is the next step
I think you need to raise the lower bit of the rock a little more. There are other very fine details, but that is going to be the end.
The lower part as in underneath the water? and if that is the end are you ending the game?
So the strip of rock under the water, raise it a bit. That is right. Double the height of that strip of rock.
